functional.notes: Evidence recorder produces deterministic run.json with exit_code and optional artefact hashes.
evidence: tools/evidence/record_run.mjs writes run.json with command, cwd, stdout/stderr, exit_code.
tools/evidence/record_run.mjs supports --artefact <path> to hash and record sha256.
findings: Strict argument parsing avoids ambiguous commands.
Artefact hashing supports tamper-evidence for key outputs (e.g., audit_report.json).

correctness_safety.notes: Captures stdout/stderr and exit code reliably.
findings: Clear failure mode when command parsing is wrong.

performance.notes: Overhead is limited to spawning a subprocess and buffering output.

security.notes: Runs local commands; hashes only specified artefacts.
findings: No secrets handling; respects explicit operator choice of artefacts.

maintainability.notes: Small CLI with clear output contract.
findings: Easy to extend with additional metadata if needed.

summary.notes: Works well; consider documenting delimiter semantics prominently to prevent operator errors.
